p: The monthly distribution pattern of HFRS in Hubei Province from 2005 to 2014 is shown in Fig 1. It can be seen that HFRS epidemics appear to have a bimodal distribution for each year (12 months), occurring around March and September. As a result, the time frame for the range of seasonal differences for each year has been narrowed down to 6 months for this study [ 44].
